name: Introduction
pages: There appears to be a magical force that permutates every physical thing, and seems to be infinite. Unfortunately, I have not been successful with manipulating it or measuring it.$(br2)Some objects, like rocks or some plants, seem to be capable of interacting with this field in the world.

I have encountered some strange rocks underground that glow and vibrate. They seem to become temporarily indestructible when hit with a pickaxe, but eventually give up their magical protections after enough hits.

pages.title: Notium Cave
pages.text: Notium typically generates between y: 0 and y: 40
